Class Point

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Point>
    Class for representation of a point in an 2D-System
    Author:
    Tobias Keller

      int isAboveLine(Point start, Point end)
      check if this point is above the line between the points, defined by the params returns 1 if the point is above the line, -1 if it is below and 0 if it is on the line
